short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UndoBird by Bookmarker.me: Restore the classic Twitter logo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"UndoBird" by Bookmarker.me is a free browser extension specially designed to revert the recent change made by Elon Musk to the Twitter logo, replacing the new X icon with the beloved classic Twitter bird. With the introduction of the X icon, many users expressed their dissatisfaction and longing for the original Twitter bird icon, which has been an iconic symbol representing the essence of Twitter's communication platform.
If you miss seeing the familiar Twitter bird on your browser tab, "UndoBird" is the perfect solution. This extension allows you to bring back the cherished Twitter bird, instantly restoring the charm and recognition that it has held for years.
Installing "UndoBird" is quick and effortless, as it is readily available on the Chrome Web Store. With a simple click, you can bid farewell to the X icon and welcome back the Twitter bird to accompany you during your Twitter browsing sessions.
Rest assured, "UndoBird" has undergone rigorous testing to ensure it functions flawlessly without any disruptions to your browsing experience.

If you find yourself yearning for the classic Twitter bird icon or simply prefer it over the new X icon, "UndoBird" is the ideal extension for you. Reconnect with the Twitter nostalgia and give your browser tab a touch of familiarity by downloading "UndoBird" for free from the Chrome Web Store today.
Rediscover the joy of the Twitter bird and make your Twitter experience truly your own with "UndoBird"!
